p: Another comparative study concerning Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia and Slovenia was made by Adrijana Višnjić-Jevtić, Jurka Lepičnik Vodopivec, Tamara Pribišev Beleslin, and Aleksandra Šindić. An empirical study with a qualitative approach was conducted, with 91 ECEC teachers. Participants presented their views on the socio-cultural, economic, and environmental dimensions of sustainability, as well as gave practical examples that, in their view, promote a sustainable lifestyle. The ESD Rating Scale gave openings to creative approaches in ECEfS.
